content.question: If <math alttext="h" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mi>h</mi> </mrow> </mstyle> </math> is the function defined by <math alttext="h of x, equals, the fraction with numerator f prime of x, and denominator g of x" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mi>h</mi> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> <mo>=</mo> <mfrac> <mrow> <msup> <mrow> <mi>f</mi> </mrow> <mrow> <mo>′</mo> </mrow> </msup> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> </mrow> <mrow> <mi>g</mi> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> </mrow> </mfrac> </mrow> </mstyle> </math>, what is the value of <math alttext="h prime of 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>h</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
